unnormalised: So, you want to become a stock market guru, eh? Think you'll be swimming in ₹500 notes faster than you can say "bull run?" Well, hold your horses (or should I say, your shares!). Everyone dreams of getting rich quick, seeing their investments skyrocket like a rocket launched by ISRO. But remember, the stock market isn't a Bollywood movie. It's more like a game of musical chairs – when the music stops (read: when the market crashes), someone's going to be left standing without a chair. Maybe you!
